institution: Human Resources Development Service of Korea
category: Internal Human Resources Development Support Project Operation Rules/Article 27 (Subsidy Management System)
contents: Article 27 (Subsidy Management System) ① Supported companies and councils must manage project expenses by utilizing the subsidy management system designated by the Corporation. ② Registration of project expense execution is done through all payment methods, including exclusive cards and methods other than exclusive cards. Regarding the execution of project expenses, the execution of project expenses must be registered in the system., ③ The detailed operation method of the grant management system shall be determined separately by the chairman., ④ The head of the affiliated institution periodically monitors the grant management system for efficient budget execution management and settlement of grant funds. shall.
